import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from "../common/breadcrumb"; import { Typeahead } from 'react-bootstrap-typeahead'; import 'react-bootstrap-typeahead/css/Typeahead.css'; import CKEditors from "react-ckeditor-component"; import Dropzone from 'react-dropzone-uploader' const BlogPost = () => { const data = [ { name: 'Lifestyle' }, { name: 'Travel' } ] const getUploadParams = ({ meta }) => { return { url: 'https://httpbin.org/post' } } // called every time a file's `status` changes const handleChangeStatus = ({ meta, file }, status) => { } return (
